amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency (electric delivery and energy reliability) by $10 million and to reduce funding for Departmental Administration by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds in the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency account by $10,000,000 and reduce funds in the Departmental Administration account by $10,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peters (CA) amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 223 (Roll no. 320).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Peters (CA) amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 223 (Roll no. 320).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Peters (CA).
